read(count)
      Read up to `count` or available() [returns: Number of bytes available to read (int)], whichever is smallest. Allocates and returns a new `bytearray` if 1 or more bytes to read.
Parameters:
      count [value: int (optional), type: int]
Return Value: None if no bytes to read otherwise `bytearray`

file: src/link/engine_link_module.c
